desc: Let us help you eliminate pet odors and make your home smell amazing with the Belle & Mr. Tom Pet Odor Eliminator Candle! Our candles are formulated with the most effective odor neutralizer that destroys particles that cause bad odors while infusing the air with a pleasant scent. Six great scents!

layout.text: Love your Pet, Not the Odor!
Let us help you eliminate pet odors and make your home smell amazing with the Belle & Mr. Tom Pet Odor Eliminator Candle!
